Name: Space Mercenary Shooter : Episode 1
About the game: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic indie FPS inspired by early shooter games. Featuring hand crafted levels and a fully voice acted cast of characters. The first episode features our main protagonist boarding the infamous 'Enforcer' in an attempt to blow it out of orbit. MAIN CAMPAIGN Featuring a campaign taking place in a high tech Sci-Fi world. Fight your way through multiple levels in this action filled adventure. FAST PACED ACTION Classic FPS weapons with a Sci-Fi twist. Keep moving to stay alive and survive the onslaught of space mercs! FULLY VOICE ACTED Space Mercenary Shooter features a fully voiced cast of side characters and enemies..
